# 恋爱高手

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lianai-gaoshou
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lianai-gaoshou
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lianai-gaoshou
lianai-gaoshou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lianai-gaoshou
lianai-gaoshou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
